item.title: Shawn on "Share your (digital) research workflow!"
item.dc:creator: Shawn
item.description:
Hi Miriam,

I've been sketching out how I work here: http://j.mp/digital-smg But for actual step-by-step workflow, take a look at Bill Turkel: http://williamjturkel.net/how-to/

Shawn

item.title: Karin Dalziel on "Super simple CMS/blog software?"
item.dc:creator: Karin Dalziel
item.description:
I am looking for simple software that will help me generate archives pages and an RSS feed and that's it. I want individual "entries" to be completely hand coded. Preferably PHP (i.e. deployable anywhere) and text files only.

Can probably write this myself but I wanted to check if something was out there first.
